Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Santa Susanna, Hotel Serhs Sant Jordi is minutes from Levante Beach and Santa Susanna Beach. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Les Caletes Beach and Parc Francesc Macia.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 162 air-conditioned guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Conveniences include phones and safes, and you can also request irons/ironing boards.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a rooftop terrace and a garden. Additional features include concierge services, an arcade/game room, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and an elevator (lift).


Check-in time starts at 12:30 PM Check-out time is 10:30 AM
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Santa Susanna, Hotel Serhs Sant Jordi is minutes from Levante Beach and Santa Susanna Beach. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Les Caletes Beach and Parc Francesc Macia.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Levante Beach - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Santa Susanna Beach - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Les Caletes Beach - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Parc Francesc Macia - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Pau Casals Plaza - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Pineda de Mar Beach - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Marineland - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
St. Jaume Hospital - 6.2 km / 3.8 mi
Calella Beach - 6.4 km / 4 mi
Monastery El Convent in Blane - 7.8 km / 4.8 mi
Pinya de Rosa Botanical Garden - 9 km / 5.6 mi
Treumal Beach - 9.4 km / 5.9 mi
Santa Cristina's Shrine - 9.5 km / 5.9 mi
Santa Cristina Beach - 9.7 km / 6 mi
Gnomo Park - 9.9 km / 6.1 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Serhs Sant Jordi is Barcelona (BCN-Barcelona Intl.) - 65.5 km / 40.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Girona (GIR): Approximate driving time to the Sant Jordi hotel is 40 minutes and distance is 35 kilometres (22 miles).

Getting there: The easiest way to get to the hotel from the airport is by taxi. A typical single journey costs â‚¬50. Price subject to change.

Getting around: Santa Susanna can be easily explored on foot. A hire car would be useful for exploring further afield.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
